channel.title: Command Help
channel.description:
Alright for my new home it's going to be something unique when you log in. I need a command that will allow you not to talk or move when you firstly log in. You must do a dance to talk, move, & teleport.
Someone please help me throw this up will really need it in my server.

item.title: Command Help
item.dc:creator: @zoomer zoomer
item.description:
@zoomer wrote:

[quote=“imsuperman05, post:2, topic:408028”]Could be another way, but here is what I just came up with. Make a method under process() like

if(muted = true) { Connection.addNameToMuteList(playerToBan); } else { Connection.unMuteUser(playerToBan);

and declare mute as a boolean, and in the starter method or wherever you want, add muted = true;

I could be wrong and stupid, but just a thought.[/quote]

Did not work once =\ Tried it different ways with your methods just kept getting errors damn really need this.

Read full topic

item.title: Command Help
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

Could be another way, but here is what I just came up with. Make a method under process() like

if(muted = true) { Connection.addNameToMuteList(playerToBan); } else { Connection.unMuteUser(playerToBan);

and declare mute as a boolean, and in the starter method or wherever you want, add muted = true;

I could be wrong and stupid, but just a thought.

Read full topic
